body_html:
I found the problem, one of the operators after DecodeJpeg is not differentiable (or at least not implemented in TF) so the gradient cannot be computed.

Presumably Cast or Resize, but I haven't checked. Starting at Sub:0 works fine though

Tensor("Sub:0", shape=(1, 299, 299, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("ResizeBilinear:0", shape=(1, 299, 299, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("ExpandDims:0", shape=(1, ?, ?, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("Cast:0", shape=(?, ?, 3), dtype=float32)

body:
I found the problem, one of the operators after DecodeJpeg is not differentiable (or at least not implemented in TF) so the gradient cannot be computed.

Presumably Cast or Resize, but I haven't checked. Starting at Sub:0 works fine though

```
Tensor("Sub:0", shape=(1, 299, 299, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("ResizeBilinear:0", shape=(1, 299, 299, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("ExpandDims:0", shape=(1, ?, ?, 3), dtype=float32)
Tensor("Cast:0", shape=(?, ?, 3), dtype=float32)
```
